article_text: Polls show independent candidate Greg Orman is leading Republican incumbent Pat Roberts, but the Olathe businessman remains something of a mystery. “I can go to Washington as a problem-solver, not a partisan,” he says, but his critics see something else: a reluctance to take a stand.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Greg Orman, Pat Roberts, Senate, Kansas, business, independent
article_metadata.title: Greg Orman, independent candidate for Senate in Kansas, still a cipher for some voters | The Kansas City Star

article_summary:
Polls show independent candidate Greg Orman is leading Republican incumbent Pat Roberts, but the Olathe businessman remains something of a mystery.
“I can go to Washington as a problem-solver, not a partisan,” he says, but his critics see something else: a reluctance to take a stand.
